title: What I'm most excited about for the Fiddlesticks rework
body: ...is Carnival Knights working on the narrative. Loved the writing he's been doing so far, and looking forward to what he brings to Fiddlesticks' lore :)

replies.body: Big same, I sense something Fiddlesticks-y inside you, waiting to break free and haunt us all...

I'm most excited about him being a viable support for _**years**_ and then suddenly ripped away from that role to satisfy some fantasy a very small population of fiddle players have about him in the jungle.
